import axios from'axios';// Replace API_URL with your backend URL
const API_URL='http://localhost:5000';export const registerStudent=async credentials=>{try{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/student/register"),credentials);return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}};export const loginStudent=async credentials=>{try{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/student/login"),credentials);return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}};export const fetchStudents=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/students"));return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}};
